body:
Huggybaby on the forum wrote:

Here's a niggle I've had for a while. It's not a bug really, but does affect game flow a bit:

When you play a card from your hand, the next card under the cursor does not pop up until the cursor is moved. I think the pop up should be refreshed automatically, without having to move your mouse.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: refresh popup automatically

comments.body: This is a very old issue. I imagine Magarena has changed considerably since July 2011. I suggest it is closed - if it is still a problem then I am sure it will be raised again.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
